name: VR Heavy Bike Racer: Real Snow Highway Driver
name_original: VR Heavy Bike Racer: Real Snow Highway Driver
description:
The Rival Biker Gangs are on the loose and put a challenge to you on your territory. You must accept the challenge and show these rival gangs that who is boss in this city traffic and highway police chase in VR Heavy Bike Racer: Real Snow Highway Driver. The heat is on, ride you super bikes in this different traffic condition, highways chase and rival bike race challenges to become the undisputed biker urban legend for your area & territory.
With VR Heavy Bike Racer: Real Snow Highway Driver racing game, you will be riding your favorite super and extreme sports bikes in different and difficult of the situations like city traffic, highway police pursuits and the most important test will the infiltrating speed bikers which are the member of your rival area gangs. The weather is also not in your favor as the traces and streets are filled with snow and ice. This is an ultimate test of your speed bike riding skills!
This will a nonstop action packed thrilling ride on virtual reality support phones on VR Heavy Bike Racer: Real Snow Highway Driver. So download this nonstop entertainment and get ready to come back with a bang!

Game Features:
1) Super Fast VR racing Experience
2) Amazing Smooth Controls
3) Advance Super and heavy bikes
